repo_notes.content: For every plugins, make sure to link to the 'Build Tool Integration' page for setting up bundlers and list available options for configuring them.

pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: Introduce the Vue.ts repository, explaining its purpose, goals, and the problems it solves for Vue.js TypeScript development

pages.title: Architecture
pages.purpose: Document the high-level architecture of the Vue.ts system, including the relationships between packages and their integration points

pages.title: Plugins
pages.purpose: List available plugins in this project

pages.title: @vue.ts/complex-types
pages.purpose: Document the @vue.ts/complex-types package, its purpose, usage, and internal implementation

pages.title: @vue.ts/tsx-auto-props
pages.purpose: Document the @vue.ts/tsx-auto-props package, its purpose, usage, and internal implementation

pages.title: Internal Packages
pages.purpose: List available internal packages in this project

pages.title: @vue.ts/language
pages.purpose: Document the @vue.ts/language package, its integration with Volar.js, TypeScript and Vue language services

pages.title: Build Tool Integration
pages.purpose: Explain how Vue.ts integrates with various build tools (Vite, Webpack, Rollup, etc.)

pages.title: How to Contribute
pages.purpose: Provide guidelines for contributing to the Vue.ts project, including code style, code, tests, and submitting pull requests
